title.rendered: “IDF Strikes Hezbollah’s Weapon Workshop in Baalbek: Inside the Swift Response to Rocket Attacks on Israel”

content.rendered:
IDF Spokesperson:

The IDF attacked a workshop which was a site for Hezbollah’s weapons in Baalbek area. With swift action, the launchers from which rockets were fired into Israeli territory were targeted.

Earlier tonight, fighter jets attacked a workshop in Baalbek where Hezbollah kept their weapons.

In addition, about fifty launches were identified from Lebanon towards Israeli territory a short while ago. Several launches were intercepted, while the rest fell in open areas. In a swift response, aircraft attacked the launchers which were identified as the source of some of the launches towards Israel.

The attached is footage from the attack in Baalbek: https://bit.ly/43yki95
